text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Woooooooaaah! F-Finally… the Four Heavenly Lords have assembled!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Agnes Digital! Meisho Doto!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Mejiro Palmer! Daitaku Helios!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: And reigning above those four, Demon Queen Windy-chan! This is the best～! Now I'm sure we can pull this off!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Tsk tsk tsk～! We're just getting started here, My Queen!!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Eh?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Yeah, it would be good if we can get some more help. I've heard about the details of the plan, and it sounds like a very meticulous and large-scale exhibit.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: At the fewest, 10 more people could work.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: 10 people!? But it took us so long to just gather 4!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Hawawa… and and, only Palmer-san and Helios-san responded to the flyers we made….!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Dizzy… Digitan is not used to standing out, so I don't know how else I can help…!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Tsk tsk tsk then mwahaha～! Leave this to us new members to handle!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Ditto. Alright, let's do this, fam!

text_block_list.name: Palmer & Helios
text_block_list.text: WEEIIIII!!

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate B
text_block_list.text: Hey hey hey! There is something cool happening at the central courtyard! Some people are handing out candy in costumes!

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Eh? Why candy? Isn't it too early for Halloween?

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate B
text_block_list.text: It's apparently to promote their All Hooves' Day exhibit! Whatever, let's just check it out, since it looks fun!!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: Mwahahaha!! Was that good?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: We are Demon Queen Windy-chan's army! Currently recruiting allies for All Hooves' Day!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Hey hey, take some candy～! And take a flyer～! No to just passing! Yes to partying! Call all your oomfies here!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: A-AAA- This is too awesome!! Hah hah it's so blinding… this is what it's like to see gyarus up close!

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate B
text_block_list.text: Wei wei! If it isn't Palmer and Helios! What's the sitch here, looks hella fun! Also where'd you get those threads? Totes working it tho～!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Sup～! We're helping out for All Hooves' Day. Wanna join? We're still making costumes!

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Oh, Windy-chan is heading an All Hooves' Day exhibit? Hm… this honestly might be fun.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: You interested? Feel free to join!! Let's make "Demon Queen Windy-chan Castle Project" a success!!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Hawawawa, they just keep coming…! With this many people…!!

text_block_list.name: Scary Teacher
text_block_list.text: Who's making that racket!? Costumes? It's too early for All Hooves' Day!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Oh crap!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: We gotta dip!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Pant pant…! That got my heart racing… We would have gotten a stern scolding if we got caught there…

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: That was the most scared I've ever been in my whole life…! But… it-it was just a bit… fun, don't you think…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Sorry guys, I didn't think the teachers would find us so fast! We were able to hand out flyers, but it's not like anyone committed to joining yet.

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Excuse me～. I want to join Demon Queen Windy-chan's Army. This is the place, right?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Oh! Yup, it's here! …huh? When did you guys get here…!?

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate B
text_block_list.text: Hey hey! We found it! Over here guys～!
(Hustle and bustle)

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Hey, are we still using this paint? It's just gonna dry up if we leave it here!

text_block_list.name: Windy's Classmate B
text_block_list.text: That's half the blackout curtain done! Hey hey, help me hang this by the window, I want to check if the size is right.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Y-Y-Y-Yes! How does it go again? I-I use this lantern to guide customers―

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: I see, so this is when Digitan's great revival takes place. That's the timing… I've got it!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Ahahaha! I can't believe we can fill up such a big classroom! Let's get to building that Demon Queen Castle!! The project is high key going well!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: The more people participating in an exhibit, the larger the room that's allotted to them. Alright, there's still a lot of work to do!

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: …This is awesome.

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: (I mean, everyone's here to help… awesome… awesome, awesome. With this, we'll surely…!!)

text_block_list.name: Shinko Windy
text_block_list.text: …make the "Demon Queen Windy-chan Castle Project" a great success!!
